full_summary:
# Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC138 Twin Otter

## Solicitation Details

### Solicitation Number

*   Solicitation Number: W8485-237218/A

### Tender Closing Date

*   Tender Closing Date: August 19, 2022, at 14:00 (Local Time)

### Request for Supply Arrangement

*   Request for Supply Arrangement: Yes
*   Supply Arrangement Title: W8485-184741 Series – Aviation Replacement Parts

## Request Description

*   This solicitation is for the acquisition of replacement parts for the CC138 Twin Otter aircraft, specifically:
    *   Airframe Structural Components
    *   Aircraft Landing Gear Components
    *   Aircraft Wheel and Brake Systems
    *   Miscellaneous Aircraft Accessories and Components
    *   Hose and Flexible Tubing
    *   O-Ring
*   The procurement is for the Department of National Defence's Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) DAP4.

## Eligibility and Pre-Qualification

*   This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open only to qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.
*   The following companies have been invited to submit proposals:
    *   Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
    *   Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
    *   Pratt & Whitney Canada Corp.
    *   Simex Defence Inc.
    *   Tower Aerospace Inc.
    *   Genaire Limited
    *   Vector Aerospace Engine Services
    *   L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
    *   Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
    *   Tulmar Safety
    *   Canada West Avionics
    *   Mattis Aerospace
    *   M1 Composites Technology
    *   Rockwell Collins Canada
    *   Kenn Borek Air

## Contact Information

*   Contracting Officer: MCpl PJ Oakley
*   Contact Email: pj.oakley@forces.gc.ca
*   Contact Phone: 819-939-4320

## Additional Information

*   This requirement is an ongoing opportunity for qualification.
*   A notice will be posted annually on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.
*   Please submit your request to the Supply Arrangement Authority: Samantha Coles, Supply Team Leader, Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada Land and
